nodes.text: The Trans-Jardeen sector lay in the Expansion Region and contained the Jardeen system and the Pioku system. The Jardeen  system contained the planet Jardeen IV, the site of the Imperial Army training center that was used by the Galactic Empire for teaching the tactics of utilizing walkers in combat. The Pioku system shared its name with the conflict known as the Pioku Border Wars.

By 0 ABY, the Trans-Jardeen sector bordered the Great Agash sector northward and the Extorin sector and the Cantons of Lahag westward. It also formed a four-way border with the Arc d'Stot, Chitarghar, and Vatha sectors eastward, as well as another four-way border with the Har Worlds, the Piryn Shar sector, and the Vatha sector southward. Shortly after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, General Arndall Lott and Captain Iolan Gendarr of the Imperial Star Destroyer Reliance, both stationed on Jardeen IV, fled the planet before the arrival of New Republic forces.
The Trans-Jardeen sector was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
